title: r/Prorevenge My Boss Stole From Me, So I Had The IRS Shut Him Down! ðŸ¤£
description: r/Prorevenge In today's episode, OP works as a delivery driver and gets a significant amount of his income from tips. Unfortunately, his toxic boss has a policy where drivers have to share tips with the company, which is extremely illegal. OP patiently waits and collects as much evidence as he can before eventually handing over all the evidence to the IRS. The IRS gleefully audits the boss's company, and in the end OP gets a huge payout!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
